channel.title: CVE Feed for TAI Smart Factory -- QPLANT SF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TAI Smart Factory -- QPLANT SF

item.title: CVE-2024-9925|2024-10-15T08:41:00.321Z -- tai%20smart%20factory -- qplant%20sf
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in TAI Smart Factory's QPLANT SF version 1.0. Exploitation of this vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to retrieve all database information by sending a specially crafted SQL query to the ‘email’ parameter on the ‘RequestPasswordChange’ endpoint.
